name: Metal Gear Solid: Snake Eater 3D
description: STEALTH ACTION You are Snake. You are on a top secret covert operation deep in the Russian jungle. Sneak behind your enemies! Dodge their bullets! Use close-quarters combat and fight back! SURVIVAL ADVENTURE Experience a vast jungle world that explodes to life with spectacular three-dimensional visuals. Hunt for food to survive, and use camouflage to hide from your enemies.
